DOC.brief_title: TARGeted Intraoperative radioTherapy With INTRABEAM Boost Breast Cancer - A Quality Control Registry
DOC.detailed_description: Due quality control standard treatment intraoperative radiotherapy breast conserve surgery 20 Gy advance boost follow shortened external beam radiotherapy . For patient informed consent irradiation data sample Germany . All data collect anonymously several center Germany send analysis study center Mannheim . Due nature study ( registry ) need randomization . Inclusion n = 1000 patient plan .
DOC.criteria: Tumor diameter < 3,5 cm Informed consent No inform consent Tumor size > 3,5 cm No indication boost
